title: r/Maliciouscompliance This Entitled Karen Messes With The WRONG Worker!
description:
r/Maliciouscompliance In today's episode, an entitled Karen absolutely flips out at an elevator repair technician because he needed to deactivate the elevator for repairs. The Karen DEMANDS that he turns it back on immediately, and threatens to call the repairman's boss. The repairman says to go ahead because he's self-employed! What happened next was a hilarious act of instant karma! If you like this podcast, follow for more daily Reddit content!
